name: voxxrin-app
description: Voxxrin is your mobile conference companion.

scripts.bootstrap: ([ -f cloud/functions/.env.local ] || cp cloud/functions/.env.local.sample cloud/functions/.env.local) && npm ci && concurrently 'cd mobile && npm ci' 'cd cloud/hosting && npm ci' 'cd cloud/functions && npm ci' 'cd cloud/firestore && npm ci'
scripts.build-mobile:prod: cd mobile && npm run build && cd -
scripts.build-mobile:dev: cd mobile && npm run build-dev && cd -
scripts.build: npm run build:fn && npm run build:mobile
scripts.deploy:firestore: cd cloud/firestore && npm run deploy && cd -
scripts.deploy:site: cd cloud/hosting && npm run deploy && cd -
scripts.deploy: concurrently 'npm run deploy:fn' 'npm run deploy:site' 'npm run deploy:firestore'
